ai-tika-s0201t0:86_0: he wants to raise it likewise, the Majjhima reciters of the Aṅgīrasa and Uttiya at the root of the Majjhima Nikāya, and the Vaṅgīsa, “This has been shown only its meaning in the first central general garment, like a golden box and its shelter.” And alternatively, thinking, “This is the first very difficult to show it,” and he said, “It is to be the boiling backbitter this .
ai-tika-s0201t0:86_1: Herein, just as, when a man has taught and pointed out the Dhamma of the Vinaya, the Beyond of the Recital of the Dhamma and of the Vinaya, the great Saṅgha, and is included in the first precincts, and the eighteen great disciples , thus it is the first among them: “This is the great Saṅgha’s ,
ai-tika-s0201t0:86_2: ”He should teach the Dhamma, etc., which has been taught by one who is unbroken and sees, etc., and who, has no endurished meaning, and thus, “As soon as it is with the source of such faith, etc., whose covetousness is said, “I am from enmity,” etc., and he should teach Dhamma in such passage.
ai-tika-s0201t0:86_3: Hence it is said: “So, Venerable Ānanda, that is how my clan was the first ruler who brings them to the great Saṅgha” .
ai-tika-s0201t0:86_4: If he desires the first great sacrifice, the Saṅgha in this way, wanting to perform the great sacrifice, he proceeds to be stated in the name of the Sāgarakkhita.
ai-tika-s0201t0:86_5: and consisting of a great deal of liberality, he must carry it around in the gold position thus: “This is the greatest that is the colour of all these things.”
ai-tika-s0201t0:87_0: The account of the praised is finished.
